issue.title: [Rust] Specify edition="2018" in Cargo.toml
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3952](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3952). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

This is a trivial change to update Cargo.toml to specify the use of Rust 2018 edition. See this blog post for more information:
